sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ChakraCarousel from './ChakraCarousel'; import 'Kundalinii.css'; import { CardElement, useStripe, useElements } from '@stripe/react-stripe-js'; function Kundalinii() { const [showCheckout, setShowCheckout] = useState(false); const stripe = useStripe(); const elements = useElements(); const eventDetails = { title: 'Ashtanga Trip ', date: 'November 25, 2024', location: 'Zen Studio, Downtown', price: '75 EUR', description: 'Join us for a rejuvenating one-day experience combining AfroCalisteira, Ashtanga Yoga, and guided meditation.', schedule: [ { time: '10:00 AM', activity: 'AfroCalisteira Warm-Up', image: '/images/capoeira.jpg' }, { time: '11:30 AM', activity: 'Ashtanga Yoga Session', image: '/images/kundalini.jpg' }, { time: '1:00 PM', activity: 'Lunch Break', image: '/images/lunch.webp' }, { time: '2:30 PM', activity: 'Meditation & Breathwork', image: '/images/meditation.jpg' }, { time: '4:00 PM', activity: 'Latin Dance', image: '/images/latin.jpg' }, { time: '5:00 PM', activity: 'Closing Circle', image: '/images/reiki.jpg' }, ], organizer: { name: 'Anass', title: 'Afro Yoga Instructor', description: 'AfroYoga coach with expertise in transformative practices.', image: '/images/anass.jpg', }, testimonials: [ { id: 1, name: 'Sophia', feedback: 'An absolutely transformative experience!', image: '/images/isa.jpg' }, { id: 2, name: 'Liam', feedback: 'Amazing energy and connection with everyone!', image: '/images/julien.jpg' }, { id: 3, name: 'Emma', feedback: 'The perfect retreat for mind and soul.', image: '/images/ismael.jpg' }, ], }; const handleBookNow = () => setShowCheckout(true); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const cardElement = elements.getElement(CardElement); const { error, paymentMethod } = await stripe.createPaymentMethod({ type: 'card', card: cardElement }); if (error) alert(error.message); else alert('Booking confirmed!'); }; return (

{eventDetails.title}

Date: {eventDetails.date}

Location: {eventDetails.location}

Description: {eventDetails.description}

Price: {eventDetails.price}

{showCheckout && (

Checkout

Payment Information

)}

Schedule

{eventDetails.schedule.map((item, index) => (
{item.time} {item.activity}
))}

Event Organizer

{eventDetails.organizer.name}

{eventDetails.organizer.title}

{eventDetails.organizer.description}

What Participants Say

{eventDetails.testimonials.map((testimonial) => (

"{testimonial.feedback}"

- {testimonial.name}

))}

Chakra Alignment

); } export default Kundalinii;
